schema.name: dataexport.S3.inner.users.messages.email.Send
schema.doc: when we send an email to a user

fields.name: id
fields.doc: globally unique id for this event

fields.name: user_id
fields.doc: BSON id of the user that we sent the email to

fields.name: external_user_id
fields.doc: external user id of the user

fields.name: time
fields.doc: unix timestamp at which we sent the email

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.doc: API ID of the campaign this email belongs to

fields.name: message_variation_id
fields.doc: API ID of the message variation we sent

fields.name: canvas_id
fields.doc: API ID of the canvas this email belongs to

fields.name: canvas_variation_id
fields.doc: API ID of the canvas variation this user received

fields.name: canvas_variation_name
fields.doc: Name of the canvas variation this user received

fields.name: canvas_step_id
fields.doc: API ID of the canvas step this email belongs to

fields.name: send_id
fields.doc: message send ID this message belongs to

fields.name: ip_pool
fields.doc: IP Pool from which the email send was made
